name: Greatest Gifter
description:
Deliver the most presents! Play against your friends by collecting the most presents and throwing snowballs at your friends to stop them!

This is a game jam game! It was built in only 2 days! It's broken but it works! Please don't expect a fully functional experience all the way through!

This game was built together with DallenDev for an internal Aurora Punks game jam.

FAQ:
How do I quit a multiplayer game?

Alt + F4

How do I quit the game?

Alt + F4

Mac/Linux/Windows 32-bit build?

No, sorry. 

Will the game be fixed?

No. This game is provided as-is.

How do I play online?

The host needs to port forward 7777 on both UDP and TCP, then you'll need the host's public IP to join.
